docstring.long_description:
The connection is made with the VISA address in the Flojoy UI.

This block should also work with compatible Tektronix AFG31XXX instruments.
docstring.short_description: Connect Flojoy to a AFG31000 function generator.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The VISA address to connect to.

returns.name: device_addr
returns.description: The IP or VISA address of the VISA device.

videos.title: Control the AFG31000 Function Generator with Flojoy
